text: Icaria, also spelled Ikaria (), is a Greek island in the Aegean Sea, 10 nautical miles (19 km) southwest of Samos. The island is named after Icarus, the son of Daedalus in Greek mythology.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The historic capitals of the island include Oenoe and Evdilos. The island is also known for itâ€™s life expectancy. ==References== Category:Islands of Greece
